command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> {{ Add example code here }}

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new build definition.

Creates a new build definition from a build definition template informed. Optionally you can inform a hashtable with paths e values of build definitons properties to be overwrited during the creation of the build definition. Ex:

$parameters = @{ "repository.properties.tfvcMapping" = "\"{\"\"mappings\"\":[{\"\"serverPath\"\":\"\"$repositoryServerPath\"\",\"\"mappingType\"\":\"\"map\"\",\"\"localPath\"\":\"\"\\\"\"}]}\""; "variables.BranchName.value" = "$BranchName"; "triggers[0].pathFilters" = "[System.Array[]]@(\"+$repositoryServerPath\")"; "build[1].inputs.connectedServiceName" = "$sonarEndpointId" }

New-BuildDefinition -CollectionUrl $Tfs.Uri.AbsoluteUri -TeamProjectName $TeamProjectName -TemplateName $templateName -BuildDefinitionName $buildDefinitionName -TemplateTeamProjectName $TeamProjectBuildTemplate -OverwriteParameters $parameters

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the template from the new build definition will be created.
The name of the new build definition.
The name of the Team Project where the build definition template belongs. If not informed, it will be assumed the same team project of the new build definition that will be created.
A hashtable with the path (in the json of the build definition template) and value for parameters of build definition to be overwrited. Ex.:
The name of the template from the new build definition will be created.
The name of the new build definition.
The name of the Team Project where the build definition template belongs. If not informed, it will be assumed the same team project of the new build definition that will be created.
A hashtable with the path (in the json of the build definition template) and value for parameters of build definition to be overwrited. Ex.:

maml:description.maml:para: Queues a new build.
Queues a new build by the build definition name.

maml:Description.maml:para: The reason why the build will be queued. Accepted values is "manual" or "checkInShelveset" (when is a gated-checkin).
The branch from which the build will execute.
Informs for the function to not ends until the build complete.
